name: MFF-INTEGRATED CITARUM WATER RESOURCES MGT INVESTMENT PROG-PROJ 1
info: The Project's objective is to improve water availability and improve integrated water resources managment. The Project's scope are project and  program management; IWRM; capacity building; support to water resources insfrastructure development and managment; water rights stregthening; disaster managment; environmental protection;  development of information and decision support systems; stakeholder participation.
